description.fr:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>{Companion:806!} ne doit pas mourir.</color=#EEBB44></rem>
\---
{%FightStarted} {Companion:384!} devient {LinkEffect:3} d'{Companion:806!}.
\---
Mort d'un {%FAMILY_SHUSHU_NAME}\_:
{value:nb,+}\_{aura:212,value:nb} à {Companion:806!}.
description.en:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>{Companion:806!} must not die.</color=#EEBB44></rem>

{%FightStarted} {Companion:384!} becomes {Companion:806!}'s {LinkEffect:3}.
\---

{value:nb,+}\_{aura:212,value:nb} to {Companion:806!}.
description.es:
<rem><color=#EEBB44>{Companion:806!} no debe morir.</color=#EEBB44></rem>
\---

\---

description.de:
